about_the_game:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with this awesome set of items for Jiaolong the Guardian! You get two rare pieces of gear and an exclusive Golden Epic, plus you unlock Jiaolong if you don't already own him! And as a bonus, we'll toss in 3000 Common Materials!

This pack includes:
  • Jiaolong the Guardian (if you don't already own him)
  • The Rain Sage's Bloom Golden Epic
  • His Rare Storm in a Bottle and Small Pearl gear
  • 3000 Common Crafting materials
detailed_description:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with this awesome set of items for Jiaolong the Guardian! You get two rare pieces of gear and an exclusive Golden Epic, plus you unlock Jiaolong if you don't already own him! And as a bonus, we'll toss in 3000 Common Materials!

This pack includes:
  • Jiaolong the Guardian (if you don't already own him)
  • The Rain Sage's Bloom Golden Epic
  • His Rare Storm in a Bottle and Small Pearl gear
  • 3000 Common Crafting materials

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor

name: Crusaders of the Lost Idols: Jiaolong's Epic Starter Pack

  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
